title: Revocation of dentist's license
context: §447-4 Revocation of dentist&rsquo;s license. The board of dental examiners may revoke the license of any dentist who permits any dental hygienist employed by or working under the dentist&rsquo;s supervision to perform any dental operation other than that permitted under this chapter. [L 1931, c 158, §2; RL 1935, §1003; RL 1945, §2184; RL 1955, §62-4; HRS §447-4; gen ch 1985; am L 1992, c 202, §70]
